adjust_settings.message: Adjust your settings to enhance your experience.

blocked_by_extension.message: PrintFriendly might be blocked by another extension you have installed, like an ad blocker. Please temporarily disable your other extensions and try to create a PDF again.

capture_screenshot_manually.message: Use our Screenshot feature to capture this page and then export it to an image or a PDF.

choose_paper_size.message: Choose your preferred paper size for PDFs.

default_mode_checkbox.message: Don’t show these options again. You can re-enable them anytime in Settings.

default_mode_desc.message: Choose the action that should be automatically selected when you click the extension button.

email_product_sent_message.message: Your email message has been sent. You may close the page

email_sent_message.message: Your Email Message Has Been Sent

image_size_pref_desc.message: Set the size of images when viewing pages with the extension.

printer_friendly_desc.message: Remove ads and navigation from web pages. Works well with articles and text-focused pages.

printer_friendly_suggestion.message: Printer-Friendly version not what you expected? Try doing a Screenshot.

reach_out_for_support.message: For more details or support, please reach out to us at

remove_ads_description.message: Remove ads and navigation from web pages. Works well with articles and text-focused pages.

resolve_issue.message: and we will help you resolve the issue.

screenshot_ready_soon.message: Your screenshot will be ready in a moment.

screenshot_restriction_message.message: PrintFriendly works on most websites, making it easy to create cleaner, printer-friendly pages and screenshots. However, certain pages—like browser settings, extension stores, and other restricted areas—are off-limits due to browser policies. Please contact us if you have any questions.

show_screenshot_message.message: Show Screenshot Message on Printer-Friendly View

still_does_not_work.message: If it still does not work, please contact us at

strict_security_settings.message: We're sorry, but this page has strict security settings (Content Security Policy) that prevent us from creating a PrintFriendly version of the page.

text_size_pref_desc.message: Set the size of text when viewing pages with the extension.

timed_out_pdf.message: PrintFriendly may have timed out while creating the PDF. It may have been too large for our system to handle.

unable_to_generate_pdf.message: We were unable to generate a PDF for this page.
